Stage IVA      In stage IVA, cancer has spread:               - to one lymph node on the same side of the neck as the cancer and the lymph node is larger than 3 centimeters but not larger than 6 centimeters; or      - to more than one lymph node on the same side of the neck as the original tumor and the lymph nodes are not larger t
